Enable read for own organizations (billi.using: "billingPeriodId" in (select "id" from "BillingPeriods" where "subscriptionId" in (select "id" from "Subscriptions" where "organization_id" in (select "organization_id" from "memberships")))

Enable read for own organizations (billi.using: "billingPeriodId" in (select "id" from "BillingPeriods" where "subscriptionId" in (select "id" from "Subscriptions" where "organization_id" in (select "organization_id" from "memberships")))

Enable read for own organizations where.name: Enable read for own organizations where focused is true

Enable read for own organizations (organ.name: Enable read for own organizations (organizations)
Enable read for own organizations (organ.using:
id IN ( SELECT memberships.organization_id
   FROM memberships
  WHERE (memberships.user_id = requesting_user_id() and memberships.organization_id = current_organization_id()))

Enable read for own organizations via cu.name: Enable read for own organizations via customer

On update, ensure usage meter belongs to.name: On update, ensure usage meter belongs to same organization as product
On update, ensure usage meter belongs to.withCheck:
"usage_meter_id" IS NULL OR "usage_meter_id" IN (
  SELECT "id" FROM "usage_meters"
  WHERE "usage_meters"."organization_id" = (
    SELECT "organization_id" FROM "products" 
    WHERE "products"."id" = "prices"."product_id"
  )
)

Ensure organization integrity with produ.name: Ensure organization integrity with products parent table
Ensure organization integrity with products parent table

Ensure organization integrity with featu.name: Ensure organization integrity with features parent table

Enable read for customers (products).name: Enable read for customers (products)
Enable read for customers (products).using: "organization_id" in (select "organization_id" from "customers") and "active" = true and "pricing_model_id" in (select "pricing_model_id" from "customers")
